description: Database metadata configuration for the AdvancedEntities demo schema. Defines the virtual entity (vwCustomerOrderSummary) and IS-A type relationships (Product hierarchy). Copy/merge this into your main config/database-metadata-config.json before running CodeGen.

VirtualEntities.Description: Read-only virtual entity aggregating Customer and Order data into a per-customer summary. Includes lifetime spend, order counts, average order value, and recency metrics. Backed by a SQL view with LEFT JOIN (customers with zero orders still appear).
